item.title: Apple’s $600 Billion Bet on America Hasn’t Moved the Needle for Wall Street
item.description: Apple has invested more in the US than any company this year but its stock has lagged.

item.title: Why Bill Gates Says a 60-Year-Old Business Book Taught Him Emotional Intelligence
item.description: The Microsoft co-founder was always smart, but says this book taught him to understand and value EQ as well as IQ.
